Designed an interface and api system which would allow for embedded hardware to create data to analyze and improve agricultural industries. This design is currently being turned into a prototype to gather feedback for bringing a community driven product to market. This will require our team to properly establish, and manage a community whilst still progressing on the digital assets that we need. When completed our product will vastly drop the barrier to entry for growing fruits and vegetables, as well as revolutionize Big Agriculture.
